info.title: Mining Server REST API
info.description: This is the description of the mining server REST API endpoints.

get.summary: find the project natures
get.description:
User Role(s): client-admin | Project Nature(s): mining

find the project natures

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: the ID of the project for which natures have to be fetched

404.description: if project does not exist for the given projectId

put.description:
User Role(s): client-admin | Project Nature(s): mining

Changes the project natures

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: the ID of the project for which natures have to be changed

requestBody.description: The Set of project natures to assign. Available values : DISCOVERY, DISCOVERY_LIGHT, MINING, DB_CUTTER

404.description: if project does not exist for the given projectId

400.description: if the given natures param is not a valid collection of project natures

200.description: if the project natures were changed successfully

get.summary: Gets the member specified by the ID if it has access to given Project
get.description:
User Role(s): client-admin | Project Nature(s): mining,discovery,discovery-light

Gets the member specified by the ID if it has access to given Project

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: the ID of the project to search

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: the ID of the member to search

404.description: if the given project, or the member does not exist

put.summary: Assigns the specified project role to the user. User role is mandatory and existing user role is overriden whereas project nature may exist and existing project nature is not removed, only new project nature is added.
put.description:
User Role(s): admin | Project Nature(s): mining,discovery,discovery-light

Assigns the specified project role to the user. User role is mandatory and existing user role is overriden whereas project nature may exist and existing project nature is not removed, only new project nature is added.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: the ID of the project to search

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: the ID of the member to search

requestBody.description: The member to assign the project roles

404.description: if the given project or the member does not exist

200.description: successfully assigned the project role to the given member

delete.summary: Removes the member roles from the project
delete.description:
User Role(s): client-admin | Project Nature(s): mining,discovery,discovery-light

Removes the member roles from the project

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: the ID of the member whose admin access to given client is to be removed

200.description: successfully removed the roles of the given member for the given project

404.description: if the given project or member does not exist

get.summary: Get Client Logo
get.description:
User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): mining,discovery,discovery-light

Get Client Logo

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: the ID of the client to search

404.description: if the given client or the logo does not exist

put.description:
User Role(s): admin | Project Nature(s): mining

Update Client Logo

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: the ID of the client to search

404.description: if the given client does not exist

400.description: if the given file is not valid

post.summary: Create Client Logo
post.description:
User Role(s): admin | Project Nature(s): mining

Create Client Logo

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: the ID of the client to search

201.description: if the logo was saved successfully

404.description: if the given client does not exist

400.description: if the given file is not valid

delete.summary: Delete Client Logo
delete.description:
User Role(s): admin | Project Nature(s): mining

Delete Client Logo

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: the ID of the client to search

404.description: if the given client or the logo does not exist

get.summary: Find a project by id
get.description:
User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): mining,discovery,discovery-light

Find a project by id

404.description: if the given project ID does not exist

put.description:
User Role(s): client-admin | Project Nature(s): mining

Update an existing project

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: the ID of the project to be updated

404.description: if no project with the provided ID exists

400.description: if the given project is not valid

get.description:
User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): mining

Get all taxonomy types for one project

404.description: if the given project does not exist

put.description:
User Role(s): manager | Project Nature(s): mining

Update a taxonomy type

404.description: if the given project does not exist

400.description: if the given taxonomy type is not valid

post.description:
User Role(s): manager | Project Nature(s): mining

Create a new taxonomy type

404.description: if the given project does not exist

400.description: if the given taxonomy type is not valid

get.summary: Find a taxonomy by ID
get.description:
User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): mining

Find a taxonomy by ID

put.description:
User Role(s): manager | Project Nature(s): mining

Update a taxonomy

parameters.name: taxonomyId
parameters.description: the ID of the taxonomy to update

400.description: if the given taxonomy is not valid

404.description: if the given project or taxonomy ID does not exist

delete.summary: Delete a taxonomy
delete.description:
User Role(s): manager | Project Nature(s): mining

Delete a taxonomy

404.description: if the given project does not exist

204.description: regardless of the existence of the taxonomy

put.summary: Starts a job that Assign taxonomies to given modules and returns the job Id. See the job status at '/v1/jobs/{jobId}/info'
put.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Starts a job that Assign taxonomies to given modules and returns the job Id. See the job status at '/v1/jobs/{jobId}/info'

requestBody.description: Module IDs along with Taxonomies ID and states

404.description: If the given project does not exist

202.description: The job has successfully been submitted

put.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Assign taxonomies to modules

requestBody.description: Module IDs along with Taxonomies ID and states

404.description: If the given project does not exist

400.description: If id or state is not set or invalid for taxonomies

202.description: If the assignment modification was successful

post.summary: Retrieve assigned taxonomies to modules
post.description:
User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): mining

Retrieve assigned taxonomies to modules

404.description: If the given project does not exist

put.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Update a Saved Search record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the id of the Saved Seach to be updated

400.description: if the given savedSearch is not valid

403.description: not authorized to update saved search

404.description: if the given project or name does not exist

delete.summary: Delete a Saved Search record
delete.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Delete a Saved Search record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the id of the Saved Seach to be deleted

404.description: if the project does not exist

204.description: if the Saved Search was successfully deleted

403.description: not authorized to delete saved search

get.summary: Find a module by its ID
get.description:
User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): mining

Find a module by its ID

parameters.name: moduleId
parameters.description: the ID of the module to search for

parameters.name: includeContent
parameters.description: if source code needs to be included

User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Update an existing module

parameters.name: moduleId
parameters.description: the ID of the module to be updated

400.description: if the given module is not valid

404.description: if the given project or module does not exist

delete.description:
User Role(s): manager | Project Nature(s): mining

Delete a module

parameters.name: moduleId
parameters.description: the ID of the module to delete

404.description: if the given project or module does not exist

204.description: if the module was successfully deleted

put.summary: Update the comment for FieldInfo based on moduleId and ordinal
put.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Update the comment for FieldInfo based on moduleId and ordinal

parameters.name: ordinal
parameters.description: the index of the data field or table column

404.description: If the given project or moduleId or ordinal does not exist

200.description: If the comment is updated successfully

get.summary: Lists a data dictionary entry from a given record ID
get.description:
User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): mining

Lists a data dictionary entry from a given record ID

parameters.name: ddeId
parameters.description: the ID of the data dictionary entry

404.description: if the given record id, project id or module id does not exist

put.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Update a data dictionary entry

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: the ID of the project to search

parameters.name: ddeId
parameters.description: the ID of the data dictionary entry to be updated

400.description: if the given data dictionary entry is not valid

404.description: if the given project, module or data dictionary entry does not exist

delete.summary: Delete a data dictionary entry
delete.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Delete a data dictionary entry

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: the ID of the project to search

parameters.name: ddeId
parameters.description: the ID of the data dictionary entry to be deleted

204.description: always, regardless of the existence of the data dictionary entry

put.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Update a functional block

400.description: if the given uid is not valid

404.description: if the given project does not exist

delete.summary: Delete a functional block
delete.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Delete a functional block

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: the ID of the functional block to be deleted

404.description: if the project or functional block does not exist

204.description: if the functional block was successfully deleted

put.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

change status functional block

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: the ID of the functional block to be updated

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: the status of the functional block to be updated to

404.description: if the given project/functional block does not exist

put.summary: Update the Title and Description for DnaCommunity based on UUID
put.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): discovery,mining

Update the Title and Description for DnaCommunity based on UUID

404.description: If the given UUID and projectId does not exist

200.description: If the title and description is updated successfully

get.summary: Retrieve an auto-completion list from a project
get.description:
User Role(s): manager | Project Nature(s): mining

Retrieve an auto-completion list from a project

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key of the auto-completion list

404.description: if no project with the provided ID exists

400.description: if the given project is not valid

put.summary: Set the entries of an auto-completion list for a project
put.description:
User Role(s): manager | Project Nature(s): mining

Set the entries of an auto-completion list for a project

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key of the auto-completion list

404.description: if no project with the provided ID exists

400.description: if the given project is not valid

put.summary: Rename an entry in the auto-completion list for the received key for a project
put.description:
User Role(s): manager | Project Nature(s): mining

Rename an entry in the auto-completion list for the received key for a project

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the key of the auto-completion list

parameters.name: oldValue
parameters.description: the old value in the auto-completion list

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: the value to be renamed to in the auto-completion list

404.description: if no project with the provided ID exists

400.description: if the given project is not valid

get.summary: Get all available annotations
get.description:
User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): mining

Get all available annotations

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: JSON representation of the states for the returned annotations, omitting returns annotations for all states, e.g. [CANDIDATE, IN_ANALYSIS, APPROVED]

parameters.name: categoryIds
parameters.description: JSON representation of the category IDs for the returned annotations, omitting returns annotations for all categories e.g. [1, 5, 30]

parameters.name: modulename
parameters.description: restrict returned annotations to those having modules, where the module name matches this wildcard pattern, omitting returns annotations for all modules, e.g. mod?ule*01

parameters.name: modulepath
parameters.description: restrict returned annotations to those having modules, where the module path equals the given path

404.description: if the given project does not exist

put.summary: Starts a job that updates Annotation categories, metadata and returns the job Id.See the job status at '/v1/jobs/{jobId}/info
put.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining

Starts a job that updates Annotation categories, metadata and returns the job Id.See the job status at '/v1/jobs/{jobId}/info

200.description: the job has successfully been submitted

404.description: if the given project does not exist

put.description:

Requests the job to cancel

get.summary: Find all Annotations for the Annotation Search View
get.description:
User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): mining

Find all Annotations for the Annotation Search View

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: JSON representation of the states for the returned annotations, omitting returns annotations for all states, e.g. [CANDIDATE, IN_ANALYSIS, APPROVED]

parameters.name: categoryIds
parameters.description: JSON representation of the category IDs for the returned annotations, omitting returns annotations for all categories e.g. [1, 5, 30]

parameters.name: modulename
parameters.description: restrict returned annotations to those having modules, where the module name matches this wildcard pattern, omitting returns annotations for all modules, e.g. mod?ule*01

parameters.name: modulepath
parameters.description: restrict returned annotations to those having modules, where the module path equals the given path

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: the size of the resulting list, if not specified the result size is unbounded

404.description: if the given project does not exist

get.summary: Sync CF Repo with PD Repo

User Role(s): viewer | Project Nature(s): discovery

404.description: error syncing utilities

get.summary: Requests the information of all jobs if the user is authorized to access the jobs
get.description:
User Role(s): editor | Project Nature(s): mining,discovery,discovery-light

Requests the information of all jobs if the user is authorized to access the jobs

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The filter query in RSQL syntax. Possible filter properties are 'jobId', 'userName', 'status', 'submitTime', 'scheduledStartTime', 'startTime' and 'finishTime'. Time values have to be in ISO-8601 format.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: the page number to be fetched

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: the sort conditions as array of sortString

400.description: if the given sort by column does not exist
